posts.title: Sound System Docking Station
posts.content: Kick the party into high gear by blasting the good vibes all around using the sound system docking station. With features like acoustically tuned coaxial drivers and wOOx technology for  bumpin’ bass with little distortion, it will guarantee a crisp sound.

posts.title: Combination Wine Bottle Lock
posts.content: Keep your most valued wines and spirits safe from thirsty thieves with the combination wine bottle lock. Designed to fit most wine and liquor bottles, this stainless steel device ensures the bottle remains sealed until the four digit combination is entered.

posts.title: NERF Modulus Tri-Strike Blaster
posts.content: Obliterate your opponents during your next battle royal by arming yourself with the NERF modulus tri-strike blaster. This imposing blaster is designed to fire three different types of ammunition – including massive mega darts using the built-in missile launcher.

posts.title: Spongebob Aquarium Ornaments
posts.content: Who lives in a pineapple-shaped Spongebob aquarium ornament? Your goldfish, that’s who. Give your aquarium the same flair as Bikini Bottom with a new residence for your fishy friend. Make it extra dorky by adding in a mini-Spongebob or Patrick.

posts.title: Dashboard Monk
posts.content: Quell your road rage with Buddhist like control as you channel positive energy from the dashboard Monk. No matter how bad the traffic or how uncooperative the weather is, the tiny Monk’s cheerful aura will bring serenity to your inner self.

posts.title: I Hate Everything Book
posts.content: Hate all the horrible things this world has to offer with the I Hate Everything book. It’s page after page of humorously drawn objects of things the author hates along with a detailed list of everything else to hate in this world like change or poetry.

posts.title: Sunscreen Bottle Flask
posts.content: With the sunscreen bottle flask you’ll be able to discretely get rip roaring drunk next time you venture out to the beach. With a capacity to store up to 8 oz of hooch, you’ll be able to get a nice buzz going as long as you remember to re-apply every couple of hours.

posts.title: Pepperoni Pizza Beach Blanket
posts.content: There’s no better way to sizzle under the hot sun than on this pepperoni pizza beach blanket. This circular 100% microfiber towel measures five feet across and features a mouth watering pepperoni pizza design across its entire surface.

posts.title: Drink Cooling Pool Lounger
posts.content: Keep your drinks ice cold as you bake under the merciless sun with the drink cooling pool lounger. With two built-in armrest coolers and an insulated cup holder, you’ll never have to get out of the pool again to keep your buzz going.

posts.title: Ninjia Star Fridge Magnets
posts.content: Make the outside of your refrigerator look like it was the scene of an epic ninja fight by placing these ninja star fridge magnets on the door. The flat surface of the ninja star creates the effect that the star it is lodged into the metallic door.

posts.title: Smartphone Controlled Lightbulb
posts.content: Think of the smartphone controlled lightbulb as the Clapper of the 21st century. This innovative product connects to an app on your phone, allowing you to control it remotely. Apart from providing instant light, it is also dimmable you can set the mood.

posts.title: Dragon Rainspout Statue
posts.content: Fire breathing dragons have nothing on the water breathers. If you have any doubt, just check out the dragon rainspout statue in action. During storms, the dragon statue begins spewing out a steady stream of water. It’s the perfect gift for any home.
